hero.title: ColorPicker
hero.description:
markdown:Picking color for background, typography and other elements is possible by various means, among these are:  
Color Swatch, Color Palette and Color Picker Dialog.  
All these can be implemented in the color picking flow.

items.description:
markdown:1. Tapping 'Add New' in the Color Palette opens a color picker dialog.   
2. Using HLS controls (or even typing actual HEX value) user can achieve any color.

markdown:3. Changes are saved by tapping on ‘V’.  
4. New color styles is saved in the Color Palette and selected as the theme color.

sections.title: Usage Example
sections.description: In this example, user picks his own theme color.

sections.title: Additional entry points examples
sections.description: As mentioned, Color Picker dialog can be triggered by various entry points.

items.description:
markdown:1. Tapping on the HEX value will “activate” the input field (Main Input) and display the keyboard. New color can be created either by typing a hex value or by pasting a specific value.  
2. Until new valid hex value is provided, the initial color background is kept. Hex value is highlighted with either white at 25% or black at 25%, depending on the background color.

markdown:3. ‘#’ symbol is permanent and cant be deleted.  
4. Once hex value is valid (6 characters), background color changes accordingly.
